78 class OutputImpl {

81 
82  virtual void play( SourceRef aSource ) { addTrack( aSource, true ); }

110 class Output {
111  public:
112  static void play( SourceRef aSource ) { instance()->play( aSource ); }
113 
114  static TrackRef addTrack( SourceRef aSource, bool autoplay = true ) { return instance()->addTrack( aSource, autoplay ); }
115  static void removeTrack( TrackId trackId ) { instance()->removeTrack( trackId ); }
116 
117  static float getVolume() { return instance()->getVolume(); }
118  static void setVolume( float aVolume ) { instance()->setVolume( aVolume ); }
119 
120  //static TargetRef getTarget() { return instance()->getTarget(); }
121  private:
122  static OutputImpl* instance();
123 };
